text: taiwan's Capital Taipei is situated at
the country's Northern tip the city sits
in a basin between the Central and
yangming mountains and is surrounded by
the larger but quite distinct new taipe
[Music]
city in recent decades taipe has busily
transformed itself into one of the
Region's most livable cities and into
one of Asia's Premier travel
destinations today Taipei has one foot
striding towards a futuristic Utopia and
the other respectfully rooted in ancient
Chinese traditions it's easy to fall in
love with this friendly City the aroma
of Chinese street food fills the air
scooters and bicycles rule the streets
and surrounded by
Tranquility is never more than a bus
ride or hike
[Music]
away start your day with a slice of
classic
Taipei situated in the city's oldest
neighborhood wanua the longshan temple
is the spiritual heart of Taipei it's a
place where generations of locals have
come to seek Good Fortune health and
even guidance on who to
marry taiwan's political heart is the
District of Tong Shan the changai Sheek
Memorial Hall honors the memory of the
former president of the Republic of
China Memorial square is also home to
one of the city's most important
cultural sites the national Concert Hall
a stunning example of neoclassical
Chinese
architecture just a short stroll away is
228 peace Park a tranquil Memorial to
the 1949 uprisings that swed the seeds
of taiwan's
Independence step even further back into
taiwan's past at the national Taiwan
Museum and discover the country's Rich
natural cultural and political
history hop on taipei's excellent MRT
and head to the National Palace Museum
home to the world's greatest collections
of Chinese art and
Antiquities there are plenty of riches
to be found on taipe streets too enjoy
the blooms and hangle for jewelry at the
flower and Jade
markets hunt down Bargains in giant
department stores like Soo or Cruise the
smaller boutiques and restaurants in
Yong Kong
Street once you've explored taipe
streets rock it to the heavens aboard
the high-speed elevators of taipe 101
one of the world's tallest
skyscrapers while some have suggested
that the design resembles a stack of
noodle boxes the tower is widely
regarded as a stunning example of
Oriental revivalist
architecture there are plenty of natural
Vantage points around the city too just
a 15-minute walk from taipe 101 is
Elephant Mountain the most accessible of
the city's
Peaks there are no high-speed lifts here
but the 20-minute climb to the top is
worth it especially at
[Music]
sunset for more great views head to
maong Mountain the Mountain's Gondola
service starts at the taipe zoo the
largest Zoological collection in
Asia this Zoo holds a special place in
the hearts of locals and the animals are
treated like members of type's extended
family from the zoo step aboard a
gondola and glide over the Forest canopy
to Malong mountain with villages and
temples to explore Malong makes a
fabulous day trip as an important tea
growing area it is also the place to
learn the finer points of tea tasting
and
[Music]
appreciation you'll have to walk to get
to type's highest peak Mount tiing which
lies just to the north of the city in
the yang mingshan National
Park climb the 1,000 steps up through
the subtropical forest and into the
grassy Highlands that gave the area its
original name grass
Mountain all that hiking in Mountain a
can build up an appetite so when it's
time to return to the city head to the
Sherin Night Market at times it seems
half the population is here doing what
taipe locals do best enjoying great food
hunting down Bargains and simply
enjoying their incredible
[Music]
City
